```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(COVID19)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Examining situation in USA
```{r}
covid_us <- covid19("USA", level =2)

ggplot(covid_us,
       aes(x = date,
           y = confirmed)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~id)
```

# Examining sitation in USA
```{r}
covid_us %>%
  dplyr::filter(id %in%
                  c("USA, New York",
                    "USA, Arizona",
                    "USA, Utah",
                    "USA, Florida")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date,
             y = confirmed,
             colour = id)) +
  geom_line()
```
